attributes.action: ask GP's to give back the £5.25 per flu jab in these times of recession when services are being cut
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
GP's could do their bit to save money for the NHS right now.

I was disappointed to hear GP's had asked for £5.25 per jab for doing a job they are already paid well for.

I was also disappointed when the government backed their claim and in the next breath announce potential cuts to services.
